scripts.create-test-image: pnpm cleanup && pnpm copy:assets && node scripts/createTestImage.js
scripts.create-test-image:build-only: pnpm create-test-image build-only $(pnpm image:tag | tail -1) $(pnpm image:args | tail -1)
scripts.create-test-image:kind: pnpm create-test-image kind $(pnpm image:tag | tail -1) $(pnpm image:args | tail -1) --k kie-sandbox-dev-cluster
scripts.create-test-image:minikube: pnpm create-test-image minikube $(pnpm image:tag | tail -1) $(pnpm image:args | tail -1)
scripts.create-test-image:openshift: pnpm create-test-image openshift $(pnpm image:tag | tail -1) $(pnpm image:args | tail -1)
scripts.image:args: echo "--build-arg QUARKUS_PLATFORM_VERSION=$(build-env quarkusPlatform.version) --build-arg KOGITO_RUNTIME_VERSION=$(build-env kogitoRuntime.version) --build-arg ROOT_PATH=/"
scripts.image:docker:build: run-script-if --bool $([ $(command -v docker) ] && echo true || echo false) --then "docker build $(pnpm image:tag | tail -1) $(pnpm image:args | tail -1) . -f Containerfile" --else "echo Docker not found, skipping image build."
scripts.image:podman:build: run-script-if --bool $([ $(command -v podman) ] && echo true || echo false) --then "podman build $(pnpm image:tag | tail -1) $(pnpm image:args | tail -1) -f Containerfile" --else "echo Podman not found, skipping image build."
scripts.image:tag:
echo $(build-env dmnDevDeploymentBaseImage.tags) | xargs printf -- "-t $(build-env dmnDevDeploymentBaseImage.registry)/$(build-env dmnDevDeploymentBaseImage.account)/$(build-env dmnDevDeploymentBaseImage.name):%s
" | xargs echo
